attributes.action: To send Relief and health care for Palestinian hospital
attributes.additional_details: Many Palestinians have died because of the war and have no where to go in terms of health care and aid so I think the UK should send financial support and rescue teams to help those impacted by the war especially younger children who have experienced loss and injuries
attributes.background: I would like the government to help fund Palestine and provide support to the lost families and those impacted by the war

rejection.details: Information about the Government's funding for Palestinian civilians is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/extra-20m-in-humanitarian-aid-doubles-uk-support-to-palestinian-civilians
